reviewText:
It is wonderful to have this DVD to my collection

thanks

I've watched this movie twice and both times I enjoyed it from the beginning to the end!!!!!! I was so happy with the end result of Suzy's mother.  This is a movie that I would recommend to everyone to sit down on a Saturday evening and ENJOY!!!!
Pure soap opera,  but interesting  enough to keep  watching.
i am a movie collector and this is one i searched for...it is a good one. I saw this movie when it first came out on tv and had to have it when i found it on dvd.

I have waited so long to see this movie again on TV and it has not been on in so long. I was so thrilled to be able to buy it and now I can watch it every day. One thing is that ...  they left out about 30 - 45 min of the original movie and that is sad. I do not know why they did this. This movie is a long one but I love it and sad to not get to see the parts that were cut out. i hope that one day they will make another one with the whole movie.

I was so happy to finally get this! It was surprising to see that even though it had the early 1990s styles it's a story that is still up to date. And Brian Keith was wonderful!The Secrets of Lake Success

I wasn't sure at first I would like this movie -- but, it turned out to be great!!  The acting is first-rate, the story line is enticing, and it has a SURPRISE ending.  I would recommend this to anyone that likes plot twists!!
